div.p:
Let's click "Start Battle" to end the deployment and reveal
the enemy fleet. They're already closing on us, so we should start positioning

our ships to engage. To manoeuvere a ship we just left-click to select,
then right-click on our chosen location.

We need to keep one step ahead of the enemy. Let's take a
look at the movement controls available. Using these, we can

increase this ship's speed, rotate the direction and back
our ship out of trouble.

Engaging with the enemy is simple, we'll select our ship and
right-click on our target. It will then manoeuvre towards them
and, once in range, will open fire.

Using the fire-at-will button, we can also set a ship to attack
any enemy that comes within range. This arc represents the
targeting range of our ship's guns.
